text:
Oye hoye mere pehle roomie!
Honestly bhai, aaj keh deta hun. Agar mera alarm tang krta thah, toh tumhara alarm bhi kuch kum nahin thah ü§£! Upar se tumhare sangeet sessions roz before sleeping, was dope but bhai, that song haunts my dreams now ü§£!
But yes, bahut adjusting roomie theh and humne bahut ladai bhi ki hai par aakhri mein bhai hote kisliye hain!
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
FROM
"mini militia khelega? aaja sikhata hun. abbey idhar nahin udhar jaa!"
"bluff master khelega? abbey chod tu haar jaata hai" *loses 4 games straight* "arrey bhai tu toh chaapu nikla re"
TO
"bro, chatt par aaja, baat krte hain" "bro, room pr hai? chal baat krte hain" and all of your philosophical exploration journey to kitna hi tang kre, kitna hi annoy kre, kitna hi waqt le, koi pharak nahin padta. tu jab bhi smile krta thah uske baad, apni overthinking mode ko band krke mast hokar effort maarta thah, sabse bakchod feeling wohi hoti thih.

I think I would've lost contact with most of our wingies if it wasn't for you. Sharing our things, crying into each other's arms when life got too tough, entire broship rahi h tere saath.

I still remember I was having a 104 Fever and Dehydration but we were still working on your line tracking robot, and woh saala contraption 2 cm chalta thah kaise khushi se uchalte theh. Dancing in Antaragini, roaming the campus, CCD Coffees and LIbrary Study Sessions, sab kuch kara hai apun ne. 

Aaj bhi lagta hai ki bc TA101 mein tere ellipse and circle haath se itne perfect kaise aate theh? bhai apna hai alag level machau buss meri tarah purn swaroop manoos atma. 

Abhi Dual ke ek saal will be easy because of you, or become hella tough because of your annoying doubts at every juncture, but chill hai. Yeh sab toh ab normal ho gya hai. 

Also, tu hai toh Ghaziabad gaun ka hi, aajayio sheher mein kabhi bhi :P bakchodi krenge, bhagwa phailainge. (Hope you remember the Bajrang Dal prank along with NM).

Milte hai, Google Meet until we can meet.
author: Rishabh  Jain

text: thanks for being a great friend during the entire spo duration. really enjoyed killing time with you! (btw prank call yaad hai? üòâ)
author: Rishabh  Jain

text: Yo buddy! Thanks for being a great friend. Honestly, pretty happy I was in BSBE cause I got friends like you! Cheers to the past, and cheers to what the future holds!
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
Namaste Brijesh Bhaisahab!

Aapse mulakat hui thih jab aapne BSBE mein chalaang maari thih. Ek dubti naav se dusri dubti naav mein. Aapse batiyane mein bilkul effort nahin lagta, achcha hai. Aap kaafi khushmangal aur khushdil insaan hain, aise hi rahiyega. Jaise abhi tak mulakar hoti rahi hai, aage bhi karte rahiyega. To more free chai, from BSBE to Future.
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
Arrey bhai, aage banaenge memories, abhi toh shuruat hai!

Waise mini miltia, bluffmaster khelne mein kaafi mazza aata thah tumhare saath bhi, tum gawd ho unn sabme!

Milte hain bhai, karte hain bakchodi, waqt apna hai, aap jagah btayein buss.
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
harish bhai raita phailane mei mahir h. chahe woh code ho ya zindagi, apni ho ya aapki.

the only mistake I made in my four years was not following your FB Page jaldi

spam ke liye intezaar krein, baatein toh hum aage bhi kar lenge...
author: Rishabh  Jain

author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
arrey Jay bhai! aapse mil liye, iitk ka safar safal ho gya!
Jay aisa insaan hai jisko 100 kaam rehte h, dimaag ki dahi ho rakhi hoti h, phir bhi woh hasne aur madad karne se nahin peeche hota. mast bindaas insaan, apna asli Akshay Kumar yehi h. Kisiko 21 din mein paisa double karna ho toh isse gyaan lena banta h.

yun hin machate raho bidu, aapse mulakat krte rahenge aage bhi!
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
"bro, grade toh lagg jaega na?"
"bro, prof chill h na?"
"bro, project ho jaega na?"

i am so glad to be your friend and honestly, shifting into ECO has been a decision influenced by you as well (blame kr rha hun compliment nhin :P). from singing songs while sitting outside CCD during endsems, to being good friends no matter we had nothing in common. to playing badminton, trying to smash at every other opportunity, bahut mazza aaya bhai tumhare darshan ho gye. you are one of the sweetest people I have met here and I hope that you remain in my life aage bhi. loads of love brother, always <3
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
Ayye, teri mast smile, ART105A mein dosti hui, teri bhi yaad ayegi. Tera shining moment woh thah jab tu humare video mein dealing kr rha thah (yaad h Utkarsh woh mast Iron Man figurine?). Kaafi BT thih but kaafi fun bhi hua thah uss course mein (offline sem ka sabse mast and aakhri courses mein se ek). Aise hi hasta rahio, mazze maarta rahio, and logon ko YouTube par bhezta rahio humare videos dekhne ke liye!
sparksphere productions forever!
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
bhai tumse ab toh milna hota hi rahega, tumhe kahi jaane nahi de rhe hum :P

3rd year onwards hi saara khel chala lekin jab chala tab strong chala. ab kya karein, aap hain hi itne narm dil ke vyakti ki koi aapse dosti kaise na kare. Shunya mei saath dene ke liye dhanyawaad, baaki toh abhi kahani shuru hui h mere dost... aage aage dekho hota h kya üòÇ
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
bro!
uth ja bro!
Ashok ne pakad liya watt lagg jaegi!

and to many more escapades that we had. sachha bhai hai tu though thoda kameena bhi hai üòÇ
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
I still remember jab second year ke roomies ki discussion ho rhi thih and tu late ho gya that apne opinion mein, toh apun dono ka ek room ho gya thah. kaafi conditions lagi thih, kaafi mazze bhi aaye the. room shift krne mein alag seniors se ladai ki thih, aadhe time tak unka samaan hi istemaal krte theh apun log. 

kuch bhai diye jaate hain, kuch bann jaate hain. aur phir aate h tere jaise kameene bhai ü§£. we are both polar opposites in a lot of areas, except the area of being dope üòé. 4 saal mein jo kiya so sahi, but aakhri mein kaafi macha gye aap (dalaal bhaiyya).

abhi toh aage ki kaafi cheezein planned hai, aur kaafi unplanned memories and trips bhi pending h. tere saath ke 4 saal yeh kuch chuninda shabdon mein likh nhin sakta, but tu jab bada aadmi bann jaega tab likhenge kahaniya ki kitna kameena insaan thah tu, mere bina hi sitara bann gya üòú.

I think hum dono ka sabse sahi moment was coordinating and getting PHY103 ki quiz postponed using our "resources" *ahem*. 

On an ending note though, "Itna kya reject hota hai, ki coffee bhi reject krti hai". Always being there for each other, always be a constant bro!
author: Rishabh  Jain

text: Awesome dude to cry alongside :P
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
sabse pehle let me make something clear... no matter tu kitni baar keh, meine tereko treat de di thih!

ab kaam karte h asli....

tujhe yaad hai woh ajeeb sa jaanwar jo humein late night walk krte waqt golchakkr pr mila thah? mujhe bhi nahin :P kaise bhaage theh udhar se hum! 
i loved those walks and they were one of the best moments of my entire iitk life. if i have ever poured my heart out to someone while being sober, I think you are one of those 3 people who knows everything about me. 

agar TA201 ka kuch fayda hua toh yehi hua ki hum dono dost bane. from cribbing about professors, crying about love, thinking about courses and life in general, you have seen it all. but abhi toh safar chalu hua h bro, aage aage dekho hota h kya! aise thodi jaane denge tumhe :P abhi toh pakad mein aaye ho!

log kehte h you are the average of the 5 people closest to you. 
i know I am dope af because unme se ek hai tu!
author: Rishabh  Jain

text: bhai, vagueness mei nikal gya IME waala course toh üòÇ
author: Rishabh  Jain

text: From late night plannings for Biochemistry exams, developing your abstract movie, to singing songs and discussing about life and beyond, you are indeed one of the nicest and calmest people I've met and I'm glad to be your friend! Love you brother!
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
Shivansh Boi!
Tug of war yaar hai orientation waala? humari puri wing tumhare hawaale hi thih!
waise hi jaise mere attendance ke marks tumhare hawaale rahe h ü§£ü§£ü§£!

ab tumhare saath C3 mein kaafi mazze aaye, batiyaane mien, aur bakchodi phailane mein. tum kaafi badle ho inn 4 saalon mein, for the better for most parts :P aur haan thanks for the trimmer lol

aage bhi saath banaye rakhna, aise hi bakchodi krte rahenge you piece of overachieving ass ü§£ü§£ü§£
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
Snehan bhai hai bahut mast
Kabhi uske room par pahunch jao, agar woh mil gya (pokemon ki tarah hai yeh, found in the wild) toh jo samasya hoegi uspar tumhare saath charcha karega. someone who can laugh off anything serious, iski personality hai mast bilkul ü§£ü§£

milte hain bhai aage bhi, aise hi bane rehna bro!
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
Hi Sudhanshu Boi
ESO206 mein theh woh genetics waali cheezein ü§£ pehle bta dun
Also, how's the EQ :P
Was lovely to interact with you, and balcony mein beith kr batiyane mein kaafi sukoon milta that.

Kaafi dildaar insaan ho tum, aur ek number ke genius, toh bhai jab (aur) bade insaan bann jao tab yaad rakhna hum jaison ko bhi!

Milte hain buddy jald hi!
author: Rishabh  Jain

text:
Overachiever BSBE Boi, with a knack for being helpful! Was nice to be your friend and one of the good things that happened through TA202. To the future!
(Jisko Pta Hai Usko Pta Hai)
